about_the_game:
About This Game

Forge Your Legacy in the Depths of the Maw

Mawforged is a first-person fantasy wargame RPG set in the sprawling underworld of the Maw, a realm of perpetual twilight, ancient secrets, and relentless conflict. As a member of one of three iconic races—Dwarves, Elves, or Orcs—you must rebuild your faction’s Core, conquer territory, and navigate treacherous politics to rise from the depths and challenge the surface world.

Key Features

1. Strategic Wargame

  • Lead your faction in open-world battles, conquering territory and defending your Core.

  • Build and upgrade outposts to secure resources and expand your influence.

  • Engage in large-scale PvP warfare as factions clash for dominance over the Maw.

2. Faction Building and Upgrades

  • Rebuild your faction’s Core, a bastion of strength and a hub of strategic power.

  • Unlock new abilities, technologies, and upgrades through resource management and faction-wide collaboration.

  • Customize your faction’s path by prioritizing military, economic, or diplomatic advancements.

3. Political Intrigue

  • Elect your faction’s leader and influence the Maw’s future through diplomacy, alliances, and betrayals.

  • Navigate a complex political landscape where every decision shapes the balance of power.

  • Will you wield military might, economic cunning, or arcane knowledge to secure victory?

4. Community-Driven Economy

  • Master professions like blacksmithing, alchemy, and mining to craft powerful weapons, armor, and tools.

  • Trade resources and goods with other players to fuel your faction’s war machine.

  • Establish trade routes and protect them from enemy raids to ensure your faction’s prosperity.

5. Rich Lore and Worldbuilding

  • Explore a vast, interconnected world filled with unique zones, each with its own challenges, secrets, and dangers.

  • Uncover the mysteries of the Maw, from the Heart of the Maw to the Eye, the central hub of trade and intrigue.

  • Immerse yourself in the deep lore of the Dwarves, Elves, and Orcs, each with their own history, culture, and ambitions.

6. Dynamic Endgame

  • Compete in faction vs. faction warfare to conquer outposts and dominate the Maw.

  • Prepare for end-of-world events that reset the game world, offering new challenges and opportunities.

  • Will your faction rise to the top and claim ultimate victory?
